content: <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/"                        xmlns:moz="http:/www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/"> <ShortName>Mozilla Support</ShortName> <Description>Search the Mozilla Support Knowledge Base and Support Forum.</Description> <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding> <Image width="16" height="16" type="image/png">data:image/png;base64,</Image> <Url type="text/html" method="get" template="https://support.mozilla.org/hi-IN/search">   <Param name="q" value="{searchTerms}"/>   <Param name="w" value="3"/>   <Param name="qs" value="plugin"/> </Url> <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml"      rel="self"      template="https://support.mozilla.org/hi-IN/search/xml"/> <Url type="application/x-suggestions+json"      template="https://support.mozilla.org/hi-IN/search/suggestions?q={searchTerms}"/> <moz:SearchForm>https://support.mozilla.org/hi-IN/search</moz:SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
